traits.name: Abolethic Vessel
entries: The spawn must obey its aboleth master.

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The spawn can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Water Dependency
entries: The spawn takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without being immersed in water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The spawn makes one Spear attack, two Tentacle attacks, and one Psychic Lash attack.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) and takes 9 (2d8 damage) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends. The spawn has four tentacles, each of which can grapple one creature.

actions.name: Psychic Lash
entries: Ranged Spell atk +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 18 (4d8 damage) psychic damage.
